section.name: Analysis, filtering, combining, and segmentation of 2D images
section.description: The programs in this section are dedicated to basic 2D image processing tasks, like filtering by invoking plug-ins (2dimage/filter), combining pairs of images (2dimage/combiner), creating test images (2dimage/creator), and evaluating some statistics.

section.name: Analysis, filtering, combining, and segmentation of 3D images
section.description: The programs in this section are dedicated to basic 3D image processing tasks, like filtering by invoking plug-ins (3dimage/filter), combining pairs of images (3dimage/combiner), creating test images (3dimage/creator), and evaluating some statistics.

section.name: Filtering of series of 2D images in a 3D fashion (out-of-core)
section.description: The programs in this section are dedicated to processing series of 2D images in a 3D fashion out-of-core. This is intended for large images that would not fit into the main memory if processing was to be done as a true 3D images. As a result, only spacial, non-iterative filters are supported.

section.name: Image conversion
section.description: The programs in this section are used to convert beteeen the supported image file formats, to combine 2D images to a 3D representation, or to extract 2D slices from 3D images. Note, that for the conversion between pixel formats the programs mia-2dimagefilter, and mia-3dimagefilter, in conjunction with the corresponding plug-in 2dimage/filter, respective 3dimage/filter have to be used.

section.name: Registration of series of 2D images
section.description: These programs are mostly tailored for the use of motion compensation in series of myocardial perfusion images and are thought to be used in conjunction with the tools for analyis of image series in the section Tools for Myocardial Perfusion Analysis.
